Text.Page:
I don't know what's happening. The kulkaris and their allies have never been this hostile before. I mean, I suffer no delusions that we had an alliance, but really.

Everything's different now. We can't just sit around and wait for them to take us out. We need to take action.

Get rid of the {@LinkCreature:18#1#Desert Fire thrashers} and {@LinkCreature:18#2#Desert Fire shamans}. Go see {@LinkCreature:218#1003#Kardelen} at Camp Marrakeen when you've finished.

Got rid of the kulkaris, did you? Glad to hear itâ€”I needed a break!

I remember when my biggest complaint was boredom. Be careful what you wish for, eh?
